_comment: Claude Desktop Configuration for TwisterLab MCP Server
_instructions: Copy this file to: Windows: %APPDATA%\Claude\claude_desktop_config.json, Mac: ~/Library/Application Support/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json

ticket_management: real-classifier_classify_ticket - Classify a ticket based on its text
monitoring: monitoring_collect_metrics - Collect all system metrics (CPU, memory, disk)
backup: real-backup_create_backup - Create a backup for a specific service
desktop_commander: real-desktop-commander_execute_command - Execute a command on the local system (with security checks)
real-desktop-commander_execute_command_remote - Execute a command on a remote device
real-desktop-commander_get_allowed_commands - List all allowed commands in safe mode
real-desktop-commander_get_audit_log - Get the command execution audit log
browser: browser_browse - Browse a URL and return page content (Playwright or httpx fallback)
browser_status - Get browser agent status and available engines
analysis: sentiment-analyzer_analyze_sentiment - Determine the sentiment of a given text
code_review: code-review_analyze_code - Analyze a snippet of code for basic issues
code-review_security_scan - Scan code for known security patterns (hardcoded secrets, SQL injection, etc.)
cache_redis: cache_cache_get - Get a value from cache
cache_cache_set - Set a value in cache with optional TTL
cache_cache_delete - Delete a key from cache
cache_cache_keys - List cache keys matching a pattern
cache_cache_stats - Get cache statistics (clients, memory, hit rate)
database_postgresql: database_execute_query - Execute a SQL query (SELECT only)
database_list_tables - List all tables in the database
database_describe_table - Get schema for a specific table
maestro_orchestration: maestro_orchestrate - Orchestrate a complete task workflow across multiple agents
maestro_analyze_task - Analyze a task to determine category and priority

arguments.text: I am very happy with the service!
